title: CMC-Based Science Foreign Language Collaborative Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing foreign language communication skills in science domains using smartphone-based CMC (Computer-Mediated Communication) tools

learning_goals: Learners improve their foreign language writing skills on science-related topics by 30% in online discussion forums.
Learners actively participate in collaborative tasks with peer learners at an 80% or higher engagement rate when using CMC tools.
Learners acquire 150 vocabulary terms necessary for explaining scientific experiment processes in the target foreign language.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
